HEADING 1	All about Birds
HEADING 2	Kinds of Birds
HEADING 3 	The Finch
PARAGRAPH	The true finches are small to medium-sized passerine birds in the family Fringillidae.
HEADING 3	The Swan
PARAGRAPH	Swans are the birds of family antidaw within  the genus Cygnus.
HEADING 2	Habitats
HEADING 3	Wetlands
PARAGRAPH	A wetland is a land area that is saturated with water, either permantely or seasonally,such that it takes on the characteristics of a distinct ecosystem.
